page.title: 19HOME LIFE
page.content: A list of electrical gadgets used in homes. For cooking: cooker, micro-wave oven, deep fat frier, kettle, toaster, teas made, food mixer, tin opener, carving knife, refrigerator, deep freeze. For washing. boiler, automatic washing machine, tumble-drier, iron. For cleaning: vacuum cleaner, carpet shampooer. For entertainment. radio, record-player, tape-recorder, telivision, video, computer. In the house: lighting, heating, immersion heater, shaver, sewing machine. In the garden: lawn-mower, hedge-trimmer.
